room_title: Escape room "Pyrotechnic Peril" by Escape Rehoboth in Rehoboth Beach
room_address: Rehoboth Beach at the corner of Route 1 and Bay Vista Rd.
room_description: A rogue scientist, formerly associated with the Center for Disease Control, has relocated to a secret facility here in Rehoboth. He has stolen a vial of a bio-engineered virus and plans to atomize  it within a firework in the display planned for this evening on the beach. You have an hour to find the vial before he returns to his labâ€¦
